idea-plugin.name: WebView

action.description: Open a WebView in a ToolWindow

idea-plugin.description:
This plugin adds a built-in browser feature to the jetbrains integrated development environment in the toolbar to the right of the editor, allowing developers to:
- efficiently browse the web
- test front-end code
- consult online documentation without leaving the IDE greatly improving development efficiency.
as shown in the figure：

此插件为jetbrains集成开发环境添加了一个在编辑器右侧工具栏的内置浏览器功能，允许开发者在不离开IDE的情况下：
- 高效浏览网页
- 测试前端代码
- 查阅在线文档
极大提升了开发效率。
